trans-unit.source: Update the app to call the custom API
trans-unit.target: Update the app to call the custom API

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, open the MainPage.xaml file in your quickstart project, locate the **Button** element named `ButtonRefresh`, and replace it with the following XAML code:
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, open the MainPage.xaml file in your quickstart project, locate the **Button** element named `ButtonRefresh`, and replace it with the following XAML code:

trans-unit.source: This adds a new button to the page.
trans-unit.target: This adds a new button to the page.

trans-unit.source: Open the MainPage.xaml.cs code file, and add the following class definition code:
trans-unit.target: Open the MainPage.xaml.cs code file, and add the following class definition code:

trans-unit.source: This class is used to hold the row count value returned by the custom API.
trans-unit.target: This class is used to hold the row count value returned by the custom API.

trans-unit.source: Locate the **RefreshTodoItems** method in the **MainPage** class, and make sure that the `query` is defined by using the following **Where** method:
trans-unit.target: Locate the **RefreshTodoItems** method in the **MainPage** class, and make sure that the `query` is defined by using the following **Where** method:

trans-unit.source: This filters the items so that completed items are not returned by the query.
trans-unit.target: This filters the items so that completed items are not returned by the query.

trans-unit.source: In the **MainPage** class, add the following method:
trans-unit.target: In the **MainPage** class, add the following method:

trans-unit.source: This method handles the **Click** event for the new button.
trans-unit.target: This method handles the **Click** event for the new button.

trans-unit.source: The **InvokeApiAsync** method is called on the client, which sends a request to the new custom API.
trans-unit.target: The **InvokeApiAsync** method is called on the client, which sends a request to the new custom API.

trans-unit.source: The result returned by the custom API is displayed in a message dialog.
trans-unit.target: The result returned by the custom API is displayed in a message dialog.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, press the **F5** key to rebuild the project and start the app.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, press the **F5** key to rebuild the project and start the app.

trans-unit.source: In the app, type some text in **Insert a TodoItem**, then tap **Save**.
trans-unit.target: In the app, type some text in **Insert a TodoItem**, then tap **Save**.

trans-unit.source: Repeat the previous step until you have added several todo items to the list.
trans-unit.target: Repeat the previous step until you have added several todo items to the list.

trans-unit.source: A message box is displayed that indicates the number of items marked complete and the filtered query is executed again, which clears all items from the list.
trans-unit.target: A message box is displayed that indicates the number of items marked complete and the filtered query is executed again, which clears all items from the list.
